text: Gregariella coralliophaga, or the artist's mussel, is a species of bivalve mollusc in the family Mytilidae. It can be found along the Atlantic coast of North America, ranging from North Carolina to the West Indies.Abbott, R.T. & Morris, P.A. A Field Guide to Shells: Atlantic and Gulf Coasts and the West Indies. New York: Houghton Mifflin, 1995. 18. ==References== Category:Mytilidae Category:Bivalves described in 1791
title: Gregariella coralliophaga
